text: Lorenzo Ghiberti (Florence, 1378 - 1 December 1455, Florence), born Lorenzo di Bartolo, was a sculptor, painter, and architect. ==Related pages== * List of Italian painters == Bibliography == *(it) Giulia Brunetti, Ghiberti, Sansoni, Florence, 1966. *(it) Pierluigi De Vecchi ed Elda Cerchiari, I tempi dell'arte, volume 2, Bompiani, Milan, 1999. title: Lorenzo Ghiberti
